original: Paṭhamenapi jhānena jhāyī, dutiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, tatiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, catutthenapi
analyzed: paṭhamena api jhānena jhāyī dutiyena api jhānena jhāyī tatiyena api jhānena jhāyī catutthena api

original: jhānena jhāyī, savitakkasavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkavicāramattenapi jhānena
analyzed: jhānena jhāyī sa vitakka sa vicārena api jhānena jhāyī a vitakka vicāra mattena api jhānena

original: jhāyī, avitakkaavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, sappītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, nippītikenapi
analyzed: jhāyī avitakka avicārena api jhānena jhāyī sappītikena api jhānena jhāyī nippītikena api

original: jhānena jhāyī, sātasahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, upekkhāsahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī,
analyzed: jhānena jhāyī sāta sahagatena api jhānena jhāyī upekkhā sahagatena api jhānena jhāyī

original: suññatenapi jhānena jhāyī, animittenapi jhānena jhāyī, appaṇihitenapi jhānena jhāyī,
analyzed: suññatena api jhānena jhāyī animittena api jhānena jhāyī appaṇihitena api jhānena jhāyī

original: lokiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokuttarenapi jhānena jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti—
analyzed: lokiyena api jhānena jhāyī lokuttarena api jhānena jhāyī jhāna rataḥ ekatta manuyuttaḥ sadattha garukaḥ ti

original: Virajanti rāgo rajo, doso rajo, moho rajo, kodho rajo, upanāho rajo …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā rajā.
analyzed: virajanti rāgaḥ rajaḥ dosaḥ rajaḥ mohaḥ rajaḥ kodhaḥ rajaḥ upanāhaḥ rajaḥ pe sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārāḥ rajā

original: Te rajā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: te rajāḥ buddhassa bhagavataḥ pahīnāḥ ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: Tasmā buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajāpagato rajavippahīno rajavippayutto sabbarajavītivatto.
analyzed: tasmai buddhaḥ arajaḥ virajaḥ nirajaḥ raja apagataḥ raja vippahīnaḥ raja vippayutto sabba raja vītivatto

original: Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
analyzed: rāgaḥ rajaḥ na ca pana reṇu vuccati
tasmā jinaḥ vigata rajaḥ ti vuccati

original: Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
analyzed: dosaḥ rajaḥ na ca pana reṇu vuccati
tasmā jinaḥ vigata rajaḥ ti vuccati

original: Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
analyzed: mohaḥ rajaḥ na ca pana reṇu vuccati
tasmā jinaḥ vigata rajaḥ iti vuccati iti

original: Atha vā bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
analyzed: atha vā bhagavā āsīnaḥ vutthavāsaḥ ciṇṇa caraṇo pe jāti maraṇa sa sāraḥ natthi tassa punabbhavo ti
i t ca ati pada sandhi pe
tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmam pe abhilāpo ti

original: Katakiccaṁ anāsavanti buddhassa bhagavato kiccākiccaṁ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṁ pahīnaṁ ucchinnamūlaṁ tālāvatthukataṁ anabhāvaṅkataṁ āyatiṁ anuppādadhammaṁ.
analyzed: kata kiccam anāsavanti buddhassa bhagavataḥ kicca akiccam karaṇīya a karaṇīyam pahīnam ucchinna mūlam tālā vatthukatam anabhāvaṅkatam āyatim an uppāda dhamma
kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ diṭṭha āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ

original: Te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
analyzed: te āsavāḥ buddhassa bhagavataḥ pahīnāḥ ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: Pāraguṁ sabbadhammānanti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṁ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū.
analyzed: pāragum sabba dhammānan ti bhagavā sabba dhammānam abhiññā pāragū pariññā pāragū pahāna pāragū bhāvanā pāragū sacchikiriyā pāragū samāpatti pāragū

original: Abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṁ, pariññāpāragū sabbadukkhānaṁ, pahānapāragū sabbakilesānaṁ,
analyzed: abhiññā pāragū sabba dhammāna pariññā pāragū sabba dukkhāna pahāna pāragū sabba kilesāna

original: bhāvanāpāragū catunnaṁ maggānaṁ, sacchikiriyāpāragū nirodhassa, samāpattipāragū sabbasamāpattīnaṁ.
analyzed: bhāvanā pāragū catunnam maggāna sacchikiriyā pāragū nirodhassa samāpatti pāragū sabba samāpattīna
saḥ vasi pattaḥ pārami pattaḥ ariyasmim sīlasmi
vasi patto pārami patto ariyāya paññāya
vasi pattaḥ pārami pattaḥ ariyāya vimuttiyā

original: So pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto
analyzed: saḥ pāra gataḥ pāra ppattaḥ anta gataḥ anta ppattaḥ koṭi gataḥ koṭi ppattaḥ pariyanta gataḥ pariyanta ppattaḥ

original: vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto
analyzed: vosāna gataḥ vosāna ppattaḥ tāṇa gataḥ tāṇa ppattaḥ leṇa gataḥ leṇa ppattaḥ saraṇa gataḥ saraṇa ppattaḥ

original: abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto.
analyzed: abhaya gataḥ abhaya ppattaḥ accuta gataḥ accuta ppattaḥ amata gataḥ amata ppattaḥ nibbāna gataḥ nibbāna ppattaḥ

original: So vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo …pe… jātimaraṇasaṁsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
analyzed: so vutta vāsaḥ ciṇṇa caraṇaḥ pe jāti maraṇa sa sāraḥ natthi tassa punabbhavaḥ ti

original: Atthi pañhena āgamanti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi, pañhaṁ pucchitukāmo āgatomhi, pañhaṁ sotukāmo āgatomhīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
analyzed: atthi pañhena āgamanti pañhena atthikaḥ āgatomhi pañham pucchitu kāmo āgatomhi pañham sotu kāmo āgatomhi iti evam pi atthi pañhena āgama

original: Atha vā pañhatthikānaṁ pañhaṁ pucchitukāmānaṁ pañhaṁ sotukāmānaṁ āgamanaṁ abhikkamanaṁ upasaṅkamanaṁ payirupāsanaṁ atthīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
analyzed: atha vā pañhatthikānam pañham pucchitu kāmānam pañham sotu kāmānam āgamanam abhikkamanam upasaṅkamanam payirupāsanam atthi iti evam pi atthi pañhena āgama

original: Atha vā pañhāgamo tuyhaṁ atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto mayā pucchitaṁ kathetuṁ visajjetuṁ, vahassetaṁ bhāranti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṁ.
analyzed: atha vā pañha āgamaḥ tuyham atthi tvam pi pahu tvam asi alam attaḥ mayā pucchitam kathetum visajjetu vahassa itam evam pi atthi pañhena āgama
aññāvimokkham pabrūhi iti aññāvimokkho vuccati arahatta vimokkho

original: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—
analyzed: arahatta vimokkham pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi iti

original: Avijjāya pabhedananti avijjāya bhedanaṁ pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhaṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: avijjāya pabhedananti avijjāya bhedanam pabhedanam pahānam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddham amatam nibbānam

original: Chandoti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṁ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṁ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: chandoti yaḥ kāmesu kāma chandaḥ kāma rāgaḥ kāma nandī kāma taṇhā kāma sinehaḥ kāma pipāsā kāma pariḷāhaḥ kāma mucchā kāma ajjhosānam kāmoghaḥ kāma yogo kāma upādānam kāma chanda nīvaraṇa

original: Pahānaṁ kāmacchandānanti kāmacchandānaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: pahānam kāmacchandānan ti kāmacchandānam pahānam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddhim amatam nibbānam

original: Udayāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: udayāti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Domanassāti yaṁ cetasikaṁ asātaṁ cetasikaṁ dukkhaṁ cetosamphassajaṁ asātaṁ dukkhaṁ vedayitaṁ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā.
analyzed: domanassā ati yam cetasikam asātam cetasikam dukkham cetas samphassa jam asātam dukkham vedayita cetaḥ samphassa jā asātā dukkhā vedanā

original: Domanassāna cūbhayanti kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnam pahānam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddhim amatam nibbānanti

original: Thinanti yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattaṁ thinaṁ thiyanā thiyitattaṁ cittassa.
analyzed: thinanti yā cittassa a kalya tā akammañña tā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattam thinam thiyanā thiyitattam cittassa

original: Panūdananti thinassa ca panūdanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: panūdananti thinassa ca panūdanam pahānam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddhim amatam nibbānam

original: Kukkuccanti hatthakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ, pādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ, hatthapādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṁ.
analyzed: kukkuccanti hattha kukkuccampi kukkucca pāda kukkuccampi kukkucca hattha pāda kukkuccampi kukkucca
akappiye kappiya saññi tā kappiye akappiya saññi tā pe
avajje vajja saññi tā vajje avajja saññi tā

original: Yaṁ evarūpaṁ kukkuccaṁ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho, idaṁ vuccati kukkuccaṁ.
analyzed: yam evarūpam kukkuccam kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ idam vuccati kukkucca

original: Api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho—
analyzed: api ca dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ

original: Kathaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho?
analyzed: katham kata ttā ca a kata ttā ca uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ

original: “Kataṁ me kāyaduccaritaṁ, akataṁ me kāyasucaritan”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
analyzed: katam me kāya duccarita a katam me kāya su carita nti uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ

original: “kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kataḥ me pāṇātipātaḥ a katā me pāṇātipātāḥ veramaṇī iti pe

original: “kataṁ me adinnādānaṁ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katam me a dinna ādāna a katā me a dinna ādānā veramaṇī iti pe

original: “kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kataḥ me kāmesumicchācāraḥ a katā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī iti pe

original: “kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kataḥ me musāvādaḥ akatāḥ me musāvādāḥ veramaṇī iti pe

original: “katā me pisuṇā vācā, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katā me pisuṇā vācā a katā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī iti pe

original: “katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katā me pharusā vācā a katā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī iti pe

original: “kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī”ti …pe…
analyzed: kataḥ me samphappalāpaḥ akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī iti pe
katā me abhijjhā a katā me an abhijjhā ati pe
kataḥ me byāpādaḥ a kataḥ me a byāpādaḥ iti pe

original: “katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī”ti, uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
analyzed: katā me micchādiṭṭhi akatā me sammādiṭṭhī iti uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ

original: Evaṁ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
analyzed: evam kata ttā ca a kata ttā ca uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ

original: Atha vā “sīlesumhi aparipūrakārī”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho;
analyzed: atha vā sīla isumhi a paripūra kārī iti uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekhaḥ
na sati sampajaññena samannāgataḥ asmi iti

original: “abhāvitā me cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti, cattāro sammappadhānāti cattāro iddhipādāti, pañcindriyānīti, pañca balānīti, satta bojjhaṅgāti, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti …
analyzed: abhāvitāḥ me cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ati cattāro sammappadhānā ati cattāro iddhipādā ati pañcindriyāni iti pañca balāni iti satta bojjhaṅgā ati ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo ti

original: “dukkhaṁ me apariññātaṁ, samudayo me appahīno, maggo me abhāvito, nirodho me asacchikato”ti uppajjati kukkuccaṁ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
analyzed: dukkham me apariññāta samudayaḥ me appahīnaḥ maggaḥ me abhāvitaḥ nirodhaḥ me a sacchikataḥ ti uppajjati kukkuccam cetasaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ manaḥ vilekho

original: Kukkuccānaṁ nivāraṇanti kukkuccānaṁ āvaraṇaṁ nīvaraṇaṁ pahānaṁ upasamaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: kukkuccānam nivāraṇanti kukkuccānam āvaraṇam nīvaraṇam pahānam upasamam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddhim amatam nibbānam

original: Upekkhāti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa.
analyzed: upekkhā ati yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā citta sama tā citta ppassaddha tā majjhatta tā cittassa

original: Satīti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhaṁ ārabbha sati anussati …pe… sammāsati.
analyzed: satī iti yā catutthe jhāne upekkham ārabbha sati anussati pe sammāsati

original: Upekkhāsatisaṁsuddhanti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhā honti visuddhā saṁsuddhā parisuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattāti—
analyzed: upekkhā sati sa suddhanti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhāḥ honti visuddhā sa suddhā parisuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigata upakkilesā mudu bhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñja ppattā ati
dhamma takka purejavanti dhamma takkaḥ vuccati sammāsaṅkappo

original: So ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ āditas hoti puratas hoti pubbaṅgamaḥ hoti aññā vimokkhassa ati evam pi dhamma takka purejava
atha vā dhamma takko vuccati sammādiṭṭhi

original: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṁ.
analyzed: sā āditas hoti puratas hoti pubbaṅgamaḥ hoti aññā vimokkhassa ati evam pi dhamma takka purejava

original: Atha vā dhammatakko vuccati catunnaṁ maggānaṁ pubbabhāgavipassanā.
analyzed: atha vā dhamma takkaḥ vuccati catunnam maggānam pubbabhāga vipassanā

original: Sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti—
analyzed: sā āditas hoti puratas hoti pubbaṅgamaḥ hoti aññā vimokkhassa ati
aññāvimokkham pabrūmi iti aññāvimokkho vuccati arahatta vimokkho

original: Arahattavimokkhaṁ pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti—
analyzed: arahatta vimokkham pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemi iti

original: Avijjāti dukkhe aññāṇaṁ …pe… avijjā moho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: avijjā ati dukkhe aññāṇam pe avijjā mohaḥ akusala mūla

original: Pabhedananti avijjāya pabhedanaṁ pahānaṁ vūpasamaṁ paṭinissaggaṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ amataṁ nibbānanti—
analyzed: pabhedanam ti avijjāya pabhedanam pahānam vūpasamam paṭinissaggam paṭippassaddhim amatam nibbānam

original: Kiṁsu saṁyojano lokoti lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso.
analyzed: kisu sayojanaḥ loko ti lokassa sayojanam lagganam bandhanam upakkileso

original: Kena loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
analyzed: kena lokaḥ yuttaḥ payuttaḥ āyuttaḥ samāyuttaḥ laggaḥ laggitaḥ palibuddhaḥ iti

original: Kiṁsu tassa vicāraṇanti kiṁsu tassa cāraṇaṁ vicāraṇaṁ paṭivicāraṇaṁ.
analyzed: tassa vicāraṇanti kisu tassa cāraṇam vicāraṇam paṭivicāraṇa

original: Kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatīti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena
analyzed: kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccati iti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena

original: paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
analyzed: paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānam iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyati iti
nandi sayojanaḥ loko ti nandī vuccati taṇhā

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ, ayaṁ vuccati nandī.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sārāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla ayam vuccati nandī

original: Yā nandī lokassa saṁyojanaṁ lagganaṁ bandhanaṁ upakkileso, imāya nandiyā loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
analyzed: yā nandī lokassa sayojanam lagganam bandhanam upakkilesaḥ imāya nandiyā lokaḥ yuttaḥ payuttaḥ āyuttaḥ samāyuttaḥ laggaḥ laggitaḥ palibuddhaḥ ti

original: kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṁsāvitakko, ñātivitakko janapadavitakko, amarāvitakko,
analyzed: kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihisā vitakkaḥ ñāti vitakkaḥ janapada vitakkaḥ amarā vitakkaḥ

original: parānudayatāpaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṁyutto vitakko.
analyzed: para anudaya tā paṭisayuttaḥ vitakkaḥ lābha sakkāra siloka paṭisayuttaḥ vitakkaḥ anavaññatti paṭisayuttaḥ vitakkaḥ

original: Ime nava vitakkā lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā.
analyzed: ime nava vitakkāḥ lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā

original: Imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti—
analyzed: imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicarati iti
taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccati iti
taṇhā ati rūpa taṇhā pe dhamma taṇhā

original: Taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṁ iti vuccatīti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṁ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti—
analyzed: taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccati iti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṃ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyati iti

original: Kathaṁ satassa caratoti kathaṁ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti—
analyzed: katham satassa carato ti katham satassa sampajānassa carataḥ viharataḥ iriyataḥ vattayataḥ pālayataḥ yapayataḥ yāpayataḥ ti

original: Viññāṇaṁ uparujjhatīti viññāṇaṁ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṁ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti—
analyzed: viññāṇam uparujjhati iti viññāṇam nirujjhati vūpasammati attham gacchati paṭippassambhati iti

original: Bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamāti buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ puṭṭhuṁ pucchituṁ yācituṁ ajjhesituṁ pasādetuṁ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā, “tayā saddhiṁ samāgatamhā”ti—
analyzed: bhagavantam puṭṭhum āgama ati buddham bhagavantam puṭṭhum pucchitum yācitum ajjhesitum pasādetum āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā tayā saddhim samāgatamhā ati

original: Tanti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ suṇoma uggaṇhāma dhārema upadhārema upalakkhemāti—
